items.sentence: Tom and Mary won\'t be happy to see you here.
Tom and Mary\'s children go to public school.
I can\'t wear those clothes. They don\'t fit.
It wasn\'t that hard to convince Tom to help.
Tom happened to be on the same train as Mary.
What in the world do you think you\'re doing?
I want you to think about how we can improve.
I was about to go to bed when the phone rang.
It wouldn\'t take me so much time to do that.
It\'ll be hard to convince Tom to go with us.
It\'s a lot colder in Boston than it is here.
Why aren\'t you giving Tom the help he needs?
Why don\'t I stop by next weekend for dinner?
Tom admitted that he had committed the crime.
Here come the police. Let\'s get out of here.
This kind of thing happens in Australia, too.
Can\'t we wait until tomorrow to finish this?
I thought you knew Tom and Mary were married.
I want a cheeseburger, a coke and some fries.
I want everybody to know about what happened.
